meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure of my ability to succeed in the theater program
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Erin, a senior majoring in theater. Last semester was really tough — I had a lot of coursework in the major, including a seminar on theater history, a seminar on film and performance, and a theater elective I really enjoyed. But then I took a bunch of upper-level theater courses, and I started to feel like I was overloading and losing ground. I ended up taking a bunch of classes I shouldn’t have been taking, and I started to feel like I was falling behind both academically and artistically. Now I’m feeling really discouraged and unsure if I can keep up. I’m in a really good theater major, but I don’t feel like I’m doing anything particularly well in it. I’m not doing well in any of my theater classes, and I’m struggling to keep up with the reading and assignments. I’m worried that I’m going to fall behind and lose confidence in my ability to succeed in the major.
